name: Admin create secret with no project created via CLI
description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- User **cannot** create secret if there is no project created via **CLI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.

Verify that:

  • User cannot create secret if there is no project created via CLI.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login via UI
Message: [AssertionError] during step: Verify that Auth page displayed
Message: Auth page should be displayed!
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/page_steps_impl/auth_page_steps.py:18: in verify_ui_page_displayed
    assert await self._pm.auth_page.is_loaded(), "Auth page should be displayed!"
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: Auth page should be displayed!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/ui_steps.py:71: in ui_login
    await self.auth_page.verify_ui_page_displayed()
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Verify that Auth page displayed
E   Message: Auth page should be displayed!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_cli/test_secrets.py:34: in test_admin_create_secret_no_proj_cli
    await self._ui_steps.ui_login(user=user)
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login via UI
E   Message: [AssertionError] during step: Verify that Auth page displayed
E   Message: Auth page should be displayed!
